ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67537-1" EMS Protocol (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSProtocolRelationship
This eMSProtocolRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67537-1" EMS protocol (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Protocol 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.73 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSProtocolAgeCategoryRelationship
This eMSProtocolAgeCategoryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67538-9" EMS Protocol age category (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProtocolAgeCategory 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.86 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSCandidatePatientRegistryRelationship
This eMSCandidatePatientRegistryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67553-8" EMS candidate patient registry (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet RegistryType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.74 STATIC
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67537-1" EMS Protocol (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DRIV"
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived CDA Section Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSProtocolRelationship
This eMSProtocolRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Protocol 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.73 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSProtocolAgeCategoryRelationship
This eMSProtocolAgeCategoryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67538-9" EMS Protocol age category (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProtocolAgeCategory 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.86 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] eMSCandidatePatientRegistryRelationship
This eMSCandidatePatientRegistryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67553-8" EMS candidate patient registry (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet RegistryType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.74 STATIC
